participant_1.name: Svetlana
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and nurturing, enjoys connecting with others and sharing experiences
participant_1.background: my family doesn't support my career choices. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i like shopping. i often shop for shoes and watches. i currently work for a watch dealer.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: caring and hardworking, passionate about her job and family, finds joy in small moments
participant_2.background: i am a baby delivery nurse. i walk three miles every day. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family.

content.text:

Short bio: i like shopping
hey! my name is Svetlana. i enjoy shopping as well! but my favorite way to pass the time is to read a book
i love talking walks n the beach. what are you up to ?
not much, I just got back home from work!
what do you do for work ?
I am a baby delivery nurse! do you have a job?
sometimes it feels like i live at work . how many babies have you delivered ?
today i delivered three :)
are you a doctor at the hospital ?
i am a nurse
really ? is it true people with reddish brown hair heal slower ?
no, that makes no sense
yeah do you live in a house. Also, try to guess: my family doesn't ...
support your life choices
support my career choices, funny you :)
yeah I was right. iâ€™m sorry to hear that
it was unexpected , heart attack . but enough of me , how are you ?
no, letâ€™s talk about you. what is your job?
i'm a stay at home mother with a seven year old .
i see. what activities do you do with your child?
what spare time ! ? mostly i study for school and play with my kids . you ?
i love spending time with my family
my parents like for us all to eat dinner together every night. Also, try to guess: my dream car ...
is bmw
is rolls royce ghost, funny you :)
oh, i donâ€™t know much about cars
i just like cars that are fast. hows it going today ?
okay :) it was nice talking to you. bye !
thank you , i will , you have a wonderful day too ! how are you today ?
